overview: Marylu and Lauralie are gay and Mormon––two identities that might seem to contradict each other. While living in a conservative Mormon town in rural Utah, they must adapt and change their relationship in order to remain compliant with Mormon standards. For Marylu and Lauralie, the way forward isnʼt choosing one or the other, it is finding a way to be authentic to themselves and their faith.
tagline: Two women in love with each other and their faith.
title: Faithful
